<style>
    /* Google Fontsから可愛いフォントを読み込み */
    @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Monomaniac+One&display=swap');
    
    .content {
        margin-top: 0rem;
        margin-bottom: 0rem;

    .background-container{
        height: 200px;
        position: relative;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column; /* 子要素を縦に並べる */
        justify-content: center; /* 上下中央ぞろえ */
        align-items: center; /* 左右中央ぞろえ */
    }

    /* アニメーションを囲むコンテナのスタイル */
    .animation-container-for-quarto {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        min-height: 100px; /* アニメーションの表示領域の高さ */
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .jumping-text-for-quarto {
        font-family: "Monomaniac One", sans-serif;
        display: flex;
    }

    .jumping-text-for-quarto span {
        display: inline-block;
        font-size: 3rem;
        text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        animation-name: jump-for-quarto;
        animation-duration: 5s;
        animation-iteration-count: infinite;
        transform-origin: bottom center;
    }
    
    .jumping-text-for-quarto span:nth-child(2) {
        animation-delay: 0.2s;
    }
    .jumping-text-for-quarto span:nth-child(3) {
        animation-delay: 0.4s;
    }
    .jumping-text-for-quarto span:nth-child(4) {
        animation-delay: 0.6s;
    }
    .jumping-text-for-quarto span:nth-child(5) {
        animation-delay: 0.8s;
    }

    @keyframes jump-for-quarto {
        0%, 6%, 100% {
            transform: translateY(0) scale(1, 1);
        }
        1% {
            transform: scale(1.1, 0.9);
            animation-timing-function: ease-in;
        }
        3% {
            transform: translateY(-80px) scale(0.9, 1.1);
            animation-timing-function: ease-out;
        } 
        5% {
            transform: translateY(0) scale(1.1, 0.9);
        }
    }

    .center-container-for-quarto {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        overflow: hidden;
    }
</style>

<div class="background-container">
